The user being modified is the last user who can manage the scan configuration.

The scan configuration or user does not exist or

CheckGroupDto.description:
Contains information regarding a check group returned from API
            <remarks>A check group could contains multiple checks and check groups</remarks>

checkIds.description: Check Ids belong to this check group

containsPassiveOnly.description: True if this check group contains only passive; false otherwise.

CheckDto.description: Contains information regarding a check returned from API

checkGroupIds.description: Check group Ids which this check belongs to

passive.description:
Flag determine if the check is passive or active
            <remarks>Active check might be intrusive.</remarks>

UrlScanInfoDto.description: Contains scan and issue associated with a given URL

checkIds.description: Checks' id selected in the scan

IssueDto.description: Contains information regarding an issue reported

scanId.description: Scand Id which this issue belongs to

url.description: Primary URL on which issue was found

urlCount.description: The number of URLs on which the issue was found

isSuppressed.description: True if issue has been suppressed. Otherwise false.

fuzzedArea.description: The part of the HTTP request that was fuzzed.  Header, Body, QueryString, etc.

fuzzedParameter.description: The name of the parameter that was fuzzed.

fuzzedValue.description: The value injected into the fuzzed parameter.

httpVerb.description: The HTTP Verb of the request (eg. GET, POST)

aggregatedIssueMessage.description: The message associate with the issue

httpTraffics.description: The collection of HTTP traffic (requests and responses) used to detect the issue.

HttpTrafficDto.description: Contains HTTP traffic recorded during scanning

ResourcePermissionDto.description: Represents permissions granted to a resource

permissions.description: The permissions the user has to the resource

PermissionDto.description: Represents permissions granted to a resource

permissions.description: The permissions the user has to the resource

azureCloud.description: The AzureCloud location of the Service Tree component endpoints

environment.description: The operational environment of the  Service Tree component endpoints

headers.description: Http headers to be applied to the scan.  If not provided, will default to the header defaults.

trainedParameters.description: Used to set parameter value to a fixed value during scanning.

restrictToSeedList.description: RestrictToSeedList used to restrict check to provided Root URLs without crawling

crawlChildDomains.description: Used to tell scanner whether or not to crawl child domains

numberOfThreads.description: Number of threads used for scanning

minDelayBetweenRequests.description: Minimum delay between requests in milliseconds

crawlScopeConstraints.description: Crawl scope constraints are used to reduce or expand scope of crawler

checkScopeConstraints.description: Check scope constraints are used to reduce or expand scope of check

doNotAttackParams.description: Do not attack params list used to instruct WebScout to not fuzz on certain parameter

tsaStampId.description:
WebScout's Id of the TSA stamp to use for filing bugs.
            See the api/tsa/stamps API for a list.

codebaseName.description: The name of the TSA Codebase to use for filing bugs.

tfsInstance.description:
The URL of the TFS/VSTS instance to use for bug filing.
            Only required if TSA onboarding it not complete.

tfsAreaPath.description:
The TFS/VSTS area path to use for bug filing.
            Only required if TSA onboarding it not complete.

tsaOwner.description:
The owner(s) (alias@microsoft.com) to notify when bugs are filed.
            Only required if TSA onboarding it not complete.

collectTrafficLog.description: If true, traffic logs are collected during the scan.  Default: false.

isInProgress.description: True if scan is in progress. Otherwise false.

isFinished.description: True if scan is finished. Otherwise false.

hasError.description: True if scan has error. Otherwise false.

hasWarning.description: True if scan has warning. Otherwise false.

cancellationRequested.description: True if a cancellation request is pending. Otherwise false.

isImported.description: True if scan result is imported via zip file

collectTrafficLog.description: If true, traffic logs are collected during the scan.  Default: false.

tsaUploadStatus.description: Status of the process of uploading results to TSA

tsaSummaryUrl.description: URL of the summary page of the TSA upload process

filedBugsUrl.description: URL of the query for any work items created by TSA

ScanConfigAssociationDto.description: Scan configuration resource association returned from API

receiveNotifications.description: True will result in receiving notifications. Otherwise false.

CookieInventoryDto.description: List of Cookies found for a URL

url.description: The URL on which the Cookies were found

cookies.description: The list of cookies found on this URL

CookieDto.description: Represents an HTTP or JavaScript cookie

created.description: The time at which the cookie was captured by the scanner.

domain.description: The domain for which the cookie is valid.

expires.description: The expiration date and time for the cookie as a System.DateTime.

httpOnly.description: Determines whether a page script or other active content can access this cookie.

path.description: The URI Path to which the cookie applies.

secure.description: The security level of a cookie.

authenticationTypes.description: Authentication types that appropriate for this scanning credential

IssuesSummaryDto.description: Contains aggregated issues information associated with a scan

CheckSummaryDto.description: Contains aggregated information regarding a check in a scan

IssueMetadataDto.description:
Used to return all unique issue groups associated with a scan back 
            to client to reduce the amount of data sent over the wire

IssueGroupDto.description: Each isssue reported is assigned with an issue group which contains advisory information

BooleanDto.description: BooleanDto used to pass boolean value in request body

receiveNotifications.description: True will result in receiving notifications. Otherwise false.

actionable.description: True if the error is actionable. Otherwise false.

errors.description: Gets or sets the error texts.
